akn:content.akn:p: (a) In addition to the authority otherwise provided by this chapter, each Inspector General, in carrying out the provisions of this chapter, is authorized—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Public Disclosure Otherwise Prohibited by Law.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Nothing in this section shall be construed as authorizing an Inspector General to publicly disclose information otherwise prohibited from disclosure by law.

(d) Each head of an establishment shall provide the Office within the establishment with appropriate and adequate office space at central and field office locations of the establishment, together with such equipment, office supplies, and communications facilities and services as may be necessary for the operation of the offices, and shall provide necessary maintenance services for the offices and the equipment and facilities provided.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Non-applicability of Certain Provisions to Requests From Inspector General of Department of Justice.—

akn:content.akn:p: (i) Subsections (a)(1)(C) and (h) shall not apply to requests from the Inspector General of the Department of Justice.
